title: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
summary_full: There is no innocent explanation for the toxin being found in samples taken from Navalny's body, Foreign Office says.
summary_public: There is no innocent explanation for the toxin being found in samples taken from Navalny's body, Foreign Office says.

GB.label: positive
GB.evidence: UK says There is no innocent explanation for the toxin

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin
